metadata.purpose: Structured bug and issue tracking for StackTrackr development
metadata.description: Machine-readable bug tracking with priority management, milestone linking, and agent integration

BUG-006.title: Filter Chips Multiple Issues
BUG-006.description: Combined filter chip functionality problems: (1) Chips display wrong styling on page load, correct after filter interaction, (2) Filter chips lose color consistency when filters change, colors shift after add/remove operations despite hash-based color generation fix, (3) Filter chips dropdown is filtering inversely, expected behavior unclear, may affect core filtering functionality
BUG-006.technical_notes: Originally tracked as BUG-006, BUG-007, BUG-008 - consolidated as same underlying issue

BUG-007.title: Table Collect Column Dark Background Bug
BUG-007.description: Collect column shows alternating dark backgrounds on every other row that appear to be malformed highlights, creating visual inconsistency and poor readability in the table display
reproduction_steps: Notice alternating dark backgrounds on rows
BUG-007.technical_notes: Appears to be malformed highlight styling affecting table readability

BUG-009.title: CSV Import Price Data Loss Bug
BUG-009.description: CSV imports no longer pulling estimated price and purchase prices from Numista import data, causing data loss during import process
BUG-009.resolution_summary: Fixed data mapping in CSV import process to properly extract Numista pricing data

BUG-010.title: Edit Button Hover Background Bug
BUG-010.description: Edit action buttons still show background highlight on hover despite animation removal request, should have clean hover state
BUG-010.resolution_summary: Removed hover background styling from edit buttons for clean interface

BUG-011.title: Fraction Display Bug
BUG-011.description: CSV imports converting '1/2' to '12' in name fields, resolved by re-importing data with corrected CSV processing
BUG-011.resolution_summary: Fixed CSV processing to properly handle fraction characters in text fields

ui_functionality.description: User interface behavior and interaction issues

data_import.description: Issues with data import and processing
